txt.en: Gifemund is in the ore refinery building near the centre of Woodhurst.\n\nHerubrand has asked that you speak with Gifemund to gather and prepare his men for a battle for the mead hall in Woodhurst.

'A formidable Dunlending chieftain now sits on the throne of Woodhurst, and Arnwi has joined him. The men in lower Woodhurst were our brothers, but the men in the mead hall are working for the White Hand, and are not my brothers. They are wicked men, and it seems the soothsayer was right and the city has fallen.\n\n'It is up to us to act. The time has come to gather Nothmar and Gifemund's men. We must confront our foe.'
'It is good to see you have returned, [placeholder]. My men have gathered, and we are prepared.'
The reinforcements from Gapholt have arrived, and between Nothmar and Gifemund's men it may be possible to reclaim the throne of Woodhurst.

Nothmar is with Herubrand in the cellar of the farmhouse in Woodhurst.\n\nHerubrand has asked that you speak with Thane Nothmar to be sure his men are prepared for a battle for the mead hall in Woodhurst.
'Aye, we are ready. We have rested from our journey from Gapholt, and are ready for a fierce battle that is surely ahead of us.'
